root.name: Tony Tough and the Night of Roasted Moths
root.description: Tony Tough is an absurd, funny and imaginative cartoon 2D point and click adventure game for the PC. You play as Tony Tough, a short geeky PI working for the Wallen Wallen Investigation agency trying to solve a series of candy thefts when his beloved dog, Pantagruel, is kidnapped. Tony must now venture into Halloween Park, a bizarre carnival and face his past if he wants to save his dog. Tony Tough has two modes of play, and the puzzles in Advanced mode can get very hard and absurd, which can lead to frustration.
